name: Infected / Zombies (Omegga)
description: Creates the Infected minigame from a JSON template (not a .bp preset name).
author: you

minigame-template.description: Path (relative to plugin folder) to the JSON minigame template.

minigame-name.description: Name to give the minigame/preset (overrides rulesetName inside JSON).

commands.name: !infected createminigame
commands.description: Copy the JSON template into Brickadia's preset folder and load it as a minigame.
